item.title: Good movies?
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

I used to keep a very updated list but since I lost that one, here is an older version. Dated around 2005.

Movies - Actors

48 Hours (Series) - Eddie Murphy, Nick Nolte
6th Day, The - Arnold Schwarzenegger
Ace Ventura Pet Detective (Series) - Jim Carey
Adventures of Robin Hood, The (Old) - Errol Flynn
A Fistful of Dynamite - James Coburn, Rod Steiger
After the Sunset - Pierce Brosnan, Salma Hayek
Analyze This (Series) - Robert Dinero
Animal House - John Belushi
Back to School (Old) - Rodney Dangerfield
Bachelor Party - Tom Hanks
Banger Sisters, The - Goldie Hawn, Susan Sarandon
Bedazzled - Elizabeth Hurley, Brendan Fraser
Beverley Hills Cop (Series) - Eddie Murphy
Bird on a Wire - Mel Gibson
Blame it on Rio - Michael Caine
Blind Fury - Rutger Hauer
Boys from Brazil, The - Gregory Peck
Butterfly Effect, The - Ashton Kutcher
Casino - Robert Dinero, Joe Pesci
Carlito’s Way - Al Capino
Cellular - Chris Evans
Chances Are - Robert Downey Jr
Cliffhanger - Sylvester Stallone
Congo - Laura Linney, Dylan Walsh
Crybaby - Johnny Depp
Death Wish (Series) - Charles Bronson
Demolition Man - Sylvester Stalone
Desperado - Antonio Banderas, Salma Hayek
Devil’s Advocate, The - Al Pacino, Keanu Reeves
Die Hard (Series) - Bruce Willis
Dirty Harry - Clint Eastwood
Ferris Bueler’s Day Off - Matthew Broderick
For a Few Dollars More - Clint Eastwood
Frantic - Harrison Ford
French Connection (Series) - Gene Hackman
French Kiss - Meg Ryan
Frequency - Dennis Quaid
Fugitive, The - Harrison Ford
Fun With Dick and Jane (Old) - George Segal, Jane Fonda
Ghost Busters - Bill Muray, Dan Aykroyd
Godfather, The (Series) - Marlon Brando, Al Pacino
Good Fellas - Robert Deniro, Joe Pesci
Graduate, The - Dustin Hoffman
Great Escape, The - Steve Mcqueen
Groundhog Day - Bill Murray
Hatari - John Wayne
Heat - Robert Deniro, Al Pacino
Heat (Old) - Burt Renalds
Her Aliby - Tom Selleck
History of the World Part 1 - Mel Brooks
Insomnia - Al Pacino, Martin Donovan
In the Mood - Patrick Dempsey, Talia Balsam
James Bond Series - Pierce Brosnan, Sean Connery
Kelly’s Heroes - Clint Eastwood
Kramer vs Kramer - Dustin Hoffman
Last Samurai, The - Tom Cruise
Laws of Attraction - Pierce Brosnan
Lethal Weapon Series - Mel Gibson, Danny Glover
Longest Day, The - John Wayne, Richard Burton, (All the good old actors)
Man on Fire - Denzel Washington
Mission Impossible - Will Smith
Monty Python and the Holy Grail - Graham Chapman
Mummy, The (Series) - Brendan Fraser
Murder at 1600 - Wesley Snipes
My Big Fat Greek Wedding - Nia Vardalos, Michael Constantine
My Fair Lady - Audrey Hepburn, Rex Harrison
My Teacher’s Wife - Jason London
Out of Time - Denzel Washington
Pink Panther (Old, Series) - Peter Sellers
Pirates of the Caribbean (Series) - Johnny Depp
Planet of the Apes (Old, Series) - Charlton Heston
Pretty Woman - Richard Gere, Julia Roberts
P.S. - Topher Grace
Quiet Man, The - John Wayne
Recruit, The - Al Pacino, Colin Farrell
Robin Hood Men in Tights - Cary Elwes, Richard Lewis
Rundown, The - The Rock
Rush Hour (Series) - Jackie Chan
Saturday Night Fever - John Travolta
Scarface - Al Pacino
Serpico - Al Pacino
See No Evil, Hear No Evil - Richard Pryor, Gene Wilder
Serving Sara - Elizabeth Hurley, Mathew Perry
Shaun of the Dead - Simon Pegg
Showtime - Eddie Murphy, Rober DeNiro
Sin City - Bruce Willis
Sound of Music - Christopher Plummer, Julie Andrews
Spies like us - Chevy Chase, Dan Aykroyd
Star Wars (Old, Series) - Harrison Ford
Tears of the Sun - Bruce Willis
Time Cop - Jean-Claude Van Damme
Total Recall - Arnold Schwarzenegger
Trading Places - Eddie Murphy, Dan Aykroyd
Troy - Brad Pitt
Turner & Hooch - Tom Hanks
Two Mules for Sister Sara - Clint Eastwood
Under Siege - Steven Sigal
Von Ryan’s Express - Frank Sinatra
What Women Want - Mel Gibson
Where Eagles Dare - Clint Eastwood, Richard Burton
White Men Can’t Jump - Wesley Snipes
Who Am I? - Jackie Chan
You’ve got mail - Meg Ryan, Tom Hanks

item.title: Good movies?
item.dc:creator: @Man_UTD_Freak Man UTD Freak
item.description:
@Man_UTD_Freak wrote:

There is a lot more action in a number of ways in Pierce Brosnan’s films of James Bond compared to Daniel Craig. I could say the last 2 movies of the series haven’t been great but I’ll say they could have been better.

Read full topic

item.title: Good movies?
item.dc:creator: @PeterMan PeterMan
item.description:
@PeterMan wrote:

I kinda don’t like the new James Bond movies.

I grew up with Pierce Brosnan being the James Bond.

So it’s kinda weird for me to see a new one.

Also grew up playing Goldeneye on the N64

item.title: Good movies?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“goatee, post:11, topic:274549”]So to summarise the actors I want to fuck:
Seth Rogan
Bill Hader
Jonah Hill
Michael Cera
Christopher Mintz-Plass
^ I know they were all in Superbad (was so epic at the time) but every other film any of them have been in has been awesome.
Ricky Gervais (More of a comedian, but he’s acted in The Office, Extras, Night at the Museum and Ghost Town. So he is an actor aswell.)
Owen Wilson
Ben Stiller
Jack Black

They should all team up and make one big fuck fest of a sexy movie. Thinking about it alot of those actors are in Night at the Museum 2, so (as much as i reckon it’s going to be shit like the first one) I guess I’ll have to watch that one.

/ramble[/quote]
You forgot Paul Rudd tbh.

Read full topic

item.title: Good movies?
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

[quote=“goatee, post:3, topic:274549”]Scary Movie
Scary Movie 2
Scary Movie 3
Scary Movie 4
Epic Movie
Date Movie
Disaster Movie
Superhero Movie

Are all shit, so don’t watch them.[/quote]
Good lord, for a second there I thought you were suggesting for him to watch them.

Read full topic

item.title: Good movies?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“Cowie`, post:6, topic:274549”][quote author=goatee link=topic=362729.msg2756297#msg2756297 date=1240234240]
Scary Movie
Scary Movie 2
Scary Movie 3
Scary Movie 4
Epic Movie
Date Movie
Disaster Movie
Superhero Movie

Are all shit, so don’t watch them.

Any good films are comedies: Owen Wilson, Ben Stiller, Jack Black, NOT ADAM SANDLER (He’s typecast like a bitch and always plays the same role.) etc.

Tropic Thunder was pure ownage, and look out for Jack Blacks “Year One”.
[/quote]

Scary movie and Scary movie 2 are fucking epic.

P.S - Never back down, Role models == win.[/quote]
Never Back Down is a little bit overrated. I only think this because I’m a mixed martial artist. People just don’t roll out of armbars, or when someone has a Kimura shoulder lock held you aren’t gritting your teeth trying to get out if the hold with pure strength.

I’ve seen Role Models, but Seann Willam-Scott is fucking hilarious.

Read full topic
